TopicTitle: Activating and then deactivating EVA jetpack resets velocity

Articles.Content:
1. Go into a free fall (I only tested this on Kerbin in the atmosphere and on the Mun) with a Kerbal on EVA.
2. Activate the jetpack and then deactivate it
3. watch as your velocity magically gets cancelled, violating physics.
